Format.ReportDescription:
The Stop Arrival History Report shows arrival and departure times at selected locations.

Select the combination of Route, Running Board, Trip, Vehicle, Date Range, Location and Time Band you require or accept the default values.

Select the type of Output and Level of Detail required and Execute

Query.WhereSql: AND ( operator.operator_id = cent_user.operator_id OR cent_user.operator_id IS NULL ) AND cent_user.usernm = USER AND service.route_id = route.route_id AND service_patt.dest_id = destination.dest_id AND service.service_id = publish_tt.service_id AND operator.operator_id = route.operator_id AND t_acttime.employee_id = employee.employee_id AND t_acttime.vehicle_id = vehicle.vehicle_id AND t_acttime.pub_ttb_id = publish_tt.pub_ttb_id AND publish_tt.service_id = service_patt.service_id AND t_acttime.rpat_orderby = service_patt.rpat_orderby AND t_acttime.location_id = service_patt.location_id AND t_acttime.location_id = location.location_id AND extend(t_acttime.prediction, hour to second) BETWEEN t_times.from_time and t_times.to_time AND t_acttime.schedule_id = t_cleartimes.schedule_id AND t_acttime.rpat_orderby = t_cleartimes.rpat_orderby AND t_acttime.schedule_id = t_mintimes.schedule_id AND t_acttime.rpat_orderby = t_mintimes.rpat_orderby AND ( t_mintimes.initialpred = "ALL" OR ( t_acttime.send_time = t_mintimes.first_send [ AND ( validitypos_hhmmss >= {deviation} OR validityneg_hhmmss >= {deviation} ) ] ) )

PreSQL.SQLText: CREATE TEMP TABLE t_times ( from_time DATETIME HOUR TO SECOND, to_time DATETIME HOUR TO SECOND )

Query.WhereSql: AND ( operator.operator_id = cent_user.operator_id OR cent_user.operator_id IS NULL ) AND cent_user.usernm = USER
AND ( route.operator_id = cent_user.operator_id OR cent_user.operator_id IS NULL ) AND cent_user.usernm = USER
AND ( vehicle.operator_id = cent_user.operator_id OR cent_user.operator_id IS NULL ) AND cent_user.usernm = USER
AND 1 = 1 AND route.route_id = service.route_id AND service.service_id = service_patt.service_id AND service_patt.location_id = location.location_id
